item.description:
Get involved with Living Forgotten Realms, the first RPGA campaign for Dungeons and Dragons 4th Edition!

Module:
Core 1-1 - Inheritance

DM:

Mustering starts at 1 PM, Game starts no later than 1:30 PM

When the Netherese conquered Sembia those who objected were either killed or forced to flee. Decades later a young man inherits a key to the family vault abandoned seventy years earlier. Desperate for money he hires you to retrieve it contents in a gamble that something worthwhile is still there. A Living Forgotten Realms adventure set in Sembia for characters levels 1-4.

Space is limited to 6 players. If you want to reserve a space, please visit http://www.warhorn.ne... and click on Register to Attend. Walk-ins are welcome, in case a player doesn't show up, but we can't guarantee you a space unless you sign up and receive a confirmation. Please note that RSVPing here does NOT reserve you a space.

You must bring a character created using the guidelines provided by Wizards of the Coast. You can find these at http://www.wizards.co...

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: Living Forgotten Realms @ Pandemonium
